name: Clown's Hunt
description:
How To Play: Basic Movement WASD. The player is followed by The Clown all time. The Clown is too strong, and the only way to defeat him is to get stronger by killing his minions. The encounter with those minions is walking over the high bushes around the map. The Encounters with them is a Turn-Base battle system where players and enemies get turns to attack each other. Your life goes to 0 you lose. You defeat the minions you win. You kill the Clown you succeed in the game.

Credits, citations, and licenses are attached as Credits_Citations_and_Licenses.txt.
